title: What's the deal with salmon anyway?
body: Why do they do what they do? I can't deal with them personally.

title: 5 ways to improve your ability to fight a bear
body:
1. Fight a bear
2. Fight multiple bears
3. Visualise the bear, get into its mind
4. Seduce the bear's wife, demoralising it
5. Purchase an M1 Abrams.

title: Imagine a world where C# is the dominant web-dev language
body: Boy what a lovely place that would be.

title: Telsa announces new car
body: 'We couldn't get the self-driving features to stop running over children so we've decided to just go with it, it's a feature now' says Elon Musk, later claiming 'there are too many kids anyway'.

title: Want to lose all your money? Here's how!
body: Invest in my new Bitcoin: CatCoin! And use it to purchase one of my many NFTs, please I have so many apes and my children keep pleading with me to feed them.
